meanings.definition: To provide visual representation or explanation.
meanings.sent1: She used colorful drawings to illustrate her story.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used a whiteboard to illustrate the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The artist tried to illustrate a banana wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: Her smile illustrated her happiness better than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks in the sky illustrated a beautiful display of colors.

meanings.definition: To clarify or make something clear by using examples or pictures.
meanings.sent1: The diagram will illustrate how the machine works.
meanings.sent2: Can you illustrate your point with a real-life example?
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to illustrate a recipe using only emojis.
meanings.sent4: His actions illustrate his dedication to the cause.
meanings.sent5: The map will illustrate the route we need to take for our road trip.
